dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 369 IH: To eliminate the sunset of the Veterans Choice Program, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Roe of Tennessee introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To eliminate the sunset of the Veterans Choice Program, and for other purposes.

section.header: Elimination of sunset of the Veterans Choice Program
section.text: Section 101(p)(2) of the Veterans Access, Choice, and Accountability Act of 2014 (Public Law 113â€“146; 38 U.S.C. 1701 note) is amended by striking all that follows section 802 and inserting a period.
